ProductInfo.Features:
Package Contents: 55" LED-Backlit Super-Slim Professional-Grade Display w/ Digital Tuner, Remote Control, Batteries, VGA Cable (Mini 15-pin D-sub), Power Cord, CD-ROM (User Manual), Board Slot Cover, Screws, Thumbscrews
The LED-backlit 55" NEC X552S-AVT offers customers a super-slim depth of 1.7" and a brighter screen than its predecessor. This display includes AV inputs and a built-in ATSC digital tuner (SB-03TM). Its industrial-strength, full HD panel delivers high-quality imagery, and it offers advanced connectivity, including DisplayPort, HDMI and an Open Pluggable Specification (OPS) slot. These digital options increase flexibility for users in a variety of digital signage applications, especially video walls where up to 100 displays can be used in a 10x10 configuration. The optional color calibration solution enables color uniformity and fidelity across individual and multiple screens, creating a perfectly matched image in tiled digital signage environments. The X552S-AVT is ideal for hospitality, retail and government applications where minimal depth is required.
Product Type: LED-LCD TV Screen Size: 55" Backlight Technology: LED Horizontal Viewing Angle: 178° Vertical Viewing Angle: 178° Aspect Ratio: 16:9 Features: Picture on Picture, Channel Labeling Digital Tuner: ATSC Video Signal Standard: HDTV 1080p Standard Refresh Rate: 60 Hz Maximum Resolution: 1920 x 1080 Brightness: 700 Nit Scan Format: 1080p Speakers: Yes Ethernet: Yes Ethernet Technology: Ethernet HDMI: Yes Composite Video: Yes DVI: Yes VGA: Yes DisplayPort: Yes Network (RJ-45): Yes Operating Power Consumption: 160 W Standby Power Consumption: 2 W VESA Mount Standard: 300 x 300
